DOC.brief_title: Effects PUFA-rich Diet Acute Metabolic Inflammatory High-Fat Meal Responses
DOC.detailed_description: Eating saturate fat show decrease many calorie individual burn increase chronic disease risk increase inflammation , coagulation ( blood clot ) potential , blood pressure , cholesterol . Conversely , eat poly-unsaturated fat link decrease risk chronic disease . The goal study determine whether eat diet contain lot poly-unsaturated fat compensate damaging effect eat occasional high-fat meal high saturate fat . Those damaging effect interested study include much fat calorie person 's body burn , measure marker chronic disease risk blood ( inflammation marker blood clot marker ) .
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy men woman age 18 45y normal weight base body mass index ( BMI=1824.9kg/m2 ) , must sedentary ( perform less 3 hour per week structure exercise ) , participant fasting total cholesterol > 200 gm/dL , highdensity lipoprotein < 40 mg/dL , lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol > 100 mg/dL , and/or triglyceride > 150 mg/dL ( base fast blood lipid ) . Weight loss gain exceed 5 % body weight past 3 month Current participation weight loss program Any current exerciser ( great 3h per week ) Any person medically prescribe diet Any person vegan , type vegetarian pescovegetarian Any chronic metabolic disease , hyperlipidemia , gastrointestinal disorder , history medical surgical event could affect digestion absorption nutrient Any current supplement use daily multivitamin ( include fish oil supplement ) Any current medication use birth control ( include antiinflammatory NSAID use ) . Anyone pregnant , lactating , plan pregnancy Anyone donate blood plasma last 20 day Any tobacco user Anyone allergy common food allergen ( milk , egg , peanut , almond , cashew , walnut , fish , shellfish , soy wheat ) food provide study Anyone allergies component liquid meal
